name: sui-tokens
title: Sui Tokens
description: Token searcher for ScaleUIs design system
author: Borgund

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Sui Tokens
commands.subtitle: --sui-
commands.description: Search for tokens in the ScaleUI design system

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: palette
preferences.label: Show Palette
preferences.title: Show palette
preferences.description: Toggle if you want to show the palette tokens
